description: This file is a unit test for ISO639 language code handling, using Google Test framework to verify the behavior of the Language class in the WPEFramework::Core namespace.

classes.name: Language
classes.description: A class representing ISO639 language codes, with methods to access language details and validate the code.

methods.name: Language(const std::string& code)
methods.description: constructor that initializes a Language object with a language code string.

methods.name: Language(int id)
methods.description: constructor that initializes a Language object with an integer ID.

methods.name: Language(const char* code)
methods.description: constructor that initializes a Language object with a C-string language code.

methods.name: IsValid()
methods.description: checks if the Language object represents a valid language code.

methods.name: Description()
methods.description: returns the description of the language.

methods.name: Id()
methods.description: returns the internal ID of the language.
